page.title: 13The Burford Library
page.content: We went to Burford Library and spoke to the Librarian,Mrs.Yap.The Library is open on Tuesday 2-5pm and 6-7.30pm Thursday 2-5pm and 6-7.30pm Friday 9.30am-12.30pm,2-5pm Saturday 9.30am-12.30pm The Central Library is at Holton,MrsYap goes there every eight weeks to select new books.She gets 20 fiction books and 20 non-fiction.They close when it is Bank Holiday.In the library there are 6500 books.Thursday is the busiest day, but Friday is busy too.There is a service for people who need big print, but they have to pay more money.People can have as many books as they wish. Children can have tickets when they are six years old.If a child keeps a book longer than three weeks,there is a fine of 2p a week.
